title: Items of the past
body:
A game mode where every item ever made in the game is available for purchase. I'm sure plenty of people wouldn't mind using DFG one mo time. Personally I miss playing Teemo with Madred's Bloodrazor. Now imagine Madred's on a Vayne! With a Hurricane! 

Some variations to keep the mode fresh could be

a) All champions start with enough gold to buy whatever they want and are level 6.
b) Items Riot have thought about implementing but never did/brand new items. Perhaps you could use this to gather some data on new items :)
c) And we can't go without a just plain ridiculous mode maybe a mixture of urf/rise of the ascended/hexakill/stupid item mode IDK 

Anyways lads make it happen sounds like fun.

replies.body: Yeah or even patches of the past, would love to play on 4.20, 5.13 again )
